```{r,echo=FALSE}
set.seed(12)

a = round(rnorm(100, 200, 40),0)
b = round(a + rnorm(100, 0, 60), 0)
b = 400 - b
```


<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/0.7.1/p5.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/0.7.1/addons/p5.dom.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/0.7.1/addons/p5.sound.min.js"></script>



<script>
let sketch = function(p) {

p.setup = function() {

  p.createCanvas(400, 400);
  p.background('white');

  }

p.draw = function() {
    
    let w = 400;
    let h = 400;

    let tm = 10;
    let lm = 10;
    let rm = 10;
    let bm = 10;  
    
    let x = [`r a`];
    let y = [`r b`];  
    
    p.stroke('black');
    p.strokeWeight(2);
    
    p.rect(tm, lm, w-(2*rm), h-(2*bm) );
    
    
    p.text('Criterion', 0, h/2);
    p.text('Predictor', w/2, h);
    
    p.stroke('black');
    p.strokeWeight(5);
    
    let i = 0;
    while (i <= 100) {
    p.point(x[i], y[i]);
    i = i +1;
    }
    
      let mX = p.mouseX;
      let mY = p.mouseY; 

    
        if (mX < w-rm && mX > lm && 
            mY < h-bm && mY > tm) {  
        
        p.strokeWeight(2);
        
        p.fill(255,0,0, 80);
        p.rect(lm, tm, mX-lm, mY-tm);
        p.fill(0,255,0, 80);
        p.rect(w-rm, tm, mX-w+rm, mY-tm);
        p.fill(0,255,0, 80);
        p.rect(lm, h-bm, mX-lm, mY-h+bm);
        p.fill(255,0,0, 80);
        p.rect(w-rm, h-bm, mX-w+rm, mY-h+bm);
        
      let tl = 0;
      let tr = 0;
      let bl = 0;
      let br = 0;
      
      for (let i = -1; i <= x.length; i++) {
      
         if(x[i] <= mX && y[i] >  mY) { bl++ } // bl
         if(x[i] <= mX && y[i] <= mY) { tl++ } // tl
         if(x[i] >  mX && y[i] >  mY) { br++ } // br
         if(x[i] >  mX && y[i] <= mY) { tr++ } // tr
      
      }
    
     document.getElementById('tl').innerHTML = tl;
     document.getElementById('tr').innerHTML = tr;  
     document.getElementById('bl').innerHTML = bl;  
     document.getElementById('br').innerHTML = br;
     
     document.getElementById('r1').innerHTML = tl + tr;
     document.getElementById('r2').innerHTML = bl + br;  
     document.getElementById('c1').innerHTML = tl + bl;  
     document.getElementById('c2').innerHTML = tr + br;
     document.getElementById('to').innerHTML = 100; 

        } // end mouse over    
    
}

}

new p5(sketch, 'container');
</script>

<div style="width:100%;">

<div id='container' style="float:left;"></div>
